3: (A new model of mechanoid guard appears behind Nat) I cannot believe you were able to find an opening...
(The key successfully unlocks the door of the chamber) ...I'll clear the obstacles. Everyone, charge!
If you think you can get out this way...
By the order of the Queen! Activate complete lockdown!
(Tears the traitorous mechanoid in half) Malfunctioned guard neutralized.
You know what you have to do if you want to live.
My royal guards... remove these Constructs.
(Blocks a rivet coming for you) Commandant, you'll be alright. I've got you.
We have to form a line of defense around the commandant! That's our best option!
No one's hurting the commandant when Nanami is here! Hmph!
We can't just keep defending! We have to move as we fight!
We can't let any harm come to the commandant!
Do we have to worry about Kamui?
...None of my comms requests have gone through. I'll keep trying.
